thread.title: Mum arrested after doctors discover her baby is high on CRYSTAL METH – while she claims the tot had an allergic reaction to shampoo
thread.title_full: Mum arrested after doctors discover her baby is high on CRYSTAL METH – while she claims the tot had an allergic reaction to shampoo

author: mhodge
title: Mum arrested after doctors discover her baby is high on CRYSTAL METH – while she claims the tot had an allergic reaction to shampoo
text:
Opinion BABY HIGH ON METH Mum arrested after doctors discover her baby is high on CRYSTAL METH – while she claims the tot had an allergic reaction to shampoo 
The one-year-old's mother was carrying the powerful drug when she was searched by cops in California By CHRIS MURPHY and MARK HODGE 20th February 2017, 11:15 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A MOTHER has been arrested after taking her baby to hospital claiming the tot was suffering an allergic reaction – when doctors found the child was actually high on CRYSTAL METH. 
Mum Tenessa Price, 28, told officers at Oak Valley Hospital Emergency Department in California that the infant had a bad reaction to a new shampoo. 4 The hospital where the vulnerable infant was taken with a supposed allergic reaction to ‘shampoo’ 
But toxicology tests showed the one-year-old had the highly addictive narcotic, which featured in hit crime drama Breaking Bad, in his blood system. 
Police told the local Fox 40 news station that they detained Price to quiz her about the vulnerable tot’s well-being. 
While the 28-year-old claimed a dodgy hair shampoo was behind the baby’s symptoms, cops allege Price was carrying meth at the time of her arrest. related stories EX-REV'S NAKED SELFIE Shamed ex-preacher dubbed the Crystal Methodist shares nude selfie with his new toyboy lover as he reveals he is still addicted to drugs KIM'S DRUGGY EMPIRE Millions of North Koreans hooked on Breaking Bad-style crystal meth D-RUGBY SHOCKER Ex-rugby ace inspired by Breaking Bad faces jail for building his own crystal meth lab to rake in thousands 'HE WANTED TO BE ON THE SHOW' Grindr 'killer' so obsessed with Breaking Bad he wore show T-shirt to crystal meth rehab METH MURDER Brit baron's drug-dealing daughter was blasted to death by ex-boyfriend over crystal meth debt BREAKING BRITAIN Deadly crystal meth sweeping UK as cops blame Breaking Bad for 500 per cent in arrests KIM BONG-UN North Korean workers 'fed crystal meth' to help speed up construction of Kim Jong-un's skyscraper project YOBS ON TOUR Neo-Nazi Russian hooligans hooked on violence and crystal meth target more fights with England fans 
The baby was taken to another hospital for further treatment and is now under the care of Child Protective Services. 
Price was later charged with suspected child cruelty for the injury and possible death of her son. 
Last year it emerged that a girl of four died after being given a cocktail of drugs by her own mother , in a case which shocked Britain. 
John Rytting, 40, and Michala Pyke, 37, allegedly spiked Poppy Widdison with ketamine, methadone and diazepam because they wanted to have sex without being disturbed. SWNS:South West News Service
